nodes.text: The Brink of the Celestial Wake was a space station located in the Outer Rim Territories and was apparently abandoned during the Clone Wars. A task force of the Galactic Republic was stationed on the Brink, though the Jedi in charge and all his clone troopers were slaughtered by strange pink blobs.

While in the area, Anakin Skywalker discovered a single humanoid signal from the Brink; it would turn out to be that of Serra Keto, who had managed to survive on the station. Anakin rigged the station to detonate as soon as he and Serra made it out of the hangar bay.
